Bsp_VidEncConfigParams Struct Reference
External Device Interface API » External Video Encoder API

Configuration paramters for encoder. More...

#include <bsp_videoEncoder.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 standard

Detailed Description

Configuration paramters for encoder.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_VidEncConfigParams::standard

Video standard. For valid values see Fvid2_Standard.

UInt32 Bsp_VidEncConfigParams::videoDataFormat

RGB or YUV data format. valid values are given below
For valid values see Fvid2_DataFormat. For Sil9022a Encoder following data formats are supported videoDataFormat:
Output Data format, valid options are
FVID2_DF_YUV422I_YUYV,
FVID2_DF_RGB24_888,

UInt32 Bsp_VidEncConfigParams::videoIfMode

Select the video mode, like Embedded sync, different type of Discrete sync modes. For valid values see Fvid2_VideoIfMode.

UInt32 Bsp_VidEncConfigParams::videoIfWidth

videoIfWidth:
Video Interface width , valid options are
FVID2_VIFW_8BIT,
FVID2_VIFW_10BIT,
FVID2_VIFW_16BIT,
FVID2_VIFW_24BIT,
For valid values see Fvid2_VideoIfWidth.
.
